players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I don't think Charlie is innocent"
Charlie: "I am the Mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. Diana suspects me, but she doesn't know the truth yet."
You: "Charlie is the Mafioso, I investigated them last night and discovered their identity. Diana, you were right to suspect Charlie, but now we know for sure they are the killer."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
